record.title: ADJOURNMENT TO FRIDAY, OCTOBER 12, 2007
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT TO FRIDAY, OCTOBER 12, 2007 -- (House of Representatives - October 10, 2007)

[Page: H11466]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 11 a.m. on Friday, October 12, and further, when the House adjourns on that day, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Monday, October 15, for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
